content.rendered:
■ANA First Class
Number of pieces: Up to 3 pieces
Weight: Up to 32 kg/70 lb

 

■ANA Business Class
Number of pieces: Up to 2 pieces
Weight: Up to 32 kg/70 lb

 

Economy Class (Premium Economy is included.)
Number of pieces: Up to 2 pieces
Weight: Up to 23 kg/50 lb

 

For more details visit : https://www.All Nippon Airways.com .lb/english/Baggage/Baggage-Information

All Nippon Airways Excess Baggage

All Nippon Airways Hand | Cabin Baggage
